CustomField.formula: IF( Opportunity.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Contract', IF( ISPICKVAL( ia_crm__Intacct_Location__r.ia_crm__Entity_Type__c , 'Entity'), ia_crm__Intacct_Location__r.ia_crm__Intacct_Entity_ID__c , ''), IF( ISPICKVAL( ia_crm__Intacct_Entity__r.ia_crm__Entity_Type__c , 'Entity'), ia_crm__Intacct_Entity__r.ia_crm__Intacct_Entity_ID__c , ''))
CustomField.label: Intacct Entity ID
